name: History Table: Lore & Quiz
detailed_description:
Take a trip through time and learn more about the main events and people of world history with the History Table: Lore & Quiz!

The French revolution, the discovery of America, the first manned flight into space... This interactive guide contains only the main dates and events that will allow you to trace the world history from its inception to our days without becoming entangled in endless numbers and names.



You can also test your knowledge in the quiz mode. Correct answers will allow you to unlock special windows depicting the brightest historical events!

Features:


  • All information about the main events of world history
  • Track events by country, theme and time period
  • Quiz that helps you to check yourself quickly
  • Gallery of stained glass windows which will be unlocked if you give correct answers in the quiz

short_description: Take a trip through time and learn more about the main events and people of world history with the History Table: Lore & Quiz!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card capable of stereo output

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card capable of stereo output
